question: Simon Taufel, who launched his book “Finding The Gaps”, is the former cricket umpire of which country?
explanation: The book \"Finding The  Gaps: Transferable Skills to Be the Best You Can Be”  has been authored by former Australian cricket umpire Simon Taufel. This book is a way of sharing those lessons and transferable soft skills that can be applied to anyone or any vocation. Taufel is known for his accuracy and extreme fitness & maintained immense respect from players up to his retirement from the international game in 2012.
